reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable without an undershirt and appreciate its soft material, with one noting it's not scratchy like some sweaters.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice red top for holidays
items.body: Great sweater. Soft synthetic material. I usually wear a large, size 12, in most tops. The large fit great. I am tall so I wouldn’t even call it off the shoulder. It just has a nice neckline. I can even wear a bra and the straps hardly show. Read more
items.author: bimbeegirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and great fit for a small frame
items.body: Beautiful and great fit for a small frame This piece is beautiful and fits perfectly on my small frame. The quality feels nice, the material looks well made, and the style is super cute — even better in person. Definitely recommend if you’re petite and want something flattering and stylish. ⸻ Read more
items.author: cristy myers

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars After two years, it's still wearable!
items.body: I'm quite pleased with my purchase and wanted to share my thoughts. Firstly, the sweater's baggy and loose fitting style is exactly what I was looking for. It provides a relaxed and effortless look and it is true to its size. The material of the sweater is soft and comfortable against the skin. It is made of a blend that feels warm enough for cooler days, yet still breathable. The long sleeves are a great feature, providing extra warmth during chilly evenings. I appreciate that the material doesn't cause any itchiness or irritation, even when wearing it for extended periods. It seriously keeps you warm that's why I only wear it during the winter season :D In terms of construction, the stitching and seams are well-done, and I haven't noticed any loose threads or lints or quality issues so far. The sweater has held up nicely after a few washes, though, I do avoid it being in the washing machine so and it hasn't lost its shape or color. One minor drawback I encountered is that the neckline tends to stretch out slightly over time. It's not a significant issue, but I would prefer it to maintain its original shape better. Overall, it is a comfortable and stylish option for those seeking a relaxed and casual look. The quality, fit, and color are impressive, making it a versatile addition to any wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Gent Bond

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely happy
items.body: I accidentally found this amazing sweater, and fell in love with it once I tried it on - size Medium. It is super soft and very comfortable, looks great if your dressing it up with a long skirt or jeans or even legging I liked it so much I have purchased in 3 different colors and probably plan on purchasing a few more colors. Read more
items.author: Ms. Lillian

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really nice - except for inconsistent quality
items.body: I ordered a green one and liked it so much I ordered another in burgundy. They both fit great and laid nicely. I decided I needed one in white and that’s where my experience soured and why I am giving 3 stars. The first delivery of the white one definitely fit differently than the other two (much too small even though it was supposedly the same size). But worse, the stitching on the panel that fits at the hips/waist was so poorly done that you could actually see quite obviously the bunching/puckering of the seam when I had it on. But I really wanted it, so I requested an exchange after explaining my complaints. The replacement came with the exact same stitching problem, though the size fit properly this time. I really wanted to be able to keep it, but I just couldn’t walk around with such obvious puckering along the waist seam. There was no way it wouldn’t be noticed by everyone. I returned it and didn’t try to order it again since I figured the batch of white ones were duds. Nevertheless, if they could guarantee me that they would send me one that was properly put together I would still want it. The green and the burgundy are really lovely, have a flattering fit, and are comfortable. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits nice. Looks classy
items.body: Love it. Would order again in other colors! Read more
items.author: Michelle 5

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Totally cute I just ordered too small
items.body: **EDIT** THIS SELLER CHARGED ME $73 WHEN THE SWEATER IS CLEARLY ADVERTISED AS $35 AND I DIDNT REALIZE TIL I WENT TO RETURN IT NOW IT HAS BEEN OVER A WEEK SINCE I RETURNED IT AND THEY ARE "HAVING DIFFICULTY PROCESSING THE REFUND" THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE TO BE SCAMMING CUSTOMERS LIKE THIS Had to return for a larger size. It was tight on me and I wanted a more relaxed fit. The navy is dark but not quite as dark as I would have liked, so I'm going to reorder in black. It's very soft and well made and I like the cut of the neck line and how the waist isn't loose. Definitely would recommend this top Read more
items.author: Amazapple

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Very soft and flattering style. Read more
items.author: TonkasMom

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 03 White, 19 Orange, 24 Light Pink, 11 Pink, 05 Army Green, 20 Red, 09 Royal Blue, 36 Pea Green, 14 Yellow, 15 Blue Green, 31 Red Apricot, 08 Dark Khaki, 12 Dark Grey, 07 Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
